c-1: ^Aww! Try it and see how you feel afterwards.

BreathingMain: ^Let's get started with the first breathing exercise.
^> I want you to breathe ine for about 5 seconds! Then I want you to breathe out for another 5 seconds! </color>
^That's the breathing done! How do you feel?

c-0: ^That's good to hear! I'm sure you're well relaxed now.
c-1: ^Don't worry, you're just not used to the exercises yet.
^You can try again on your own before hitting the continue button!

StretchingSection: ^We're just going to do a simple <color=
^> stretch pose and I'm going need you to hold onto it for a few seconds.</color>
^That was good! I'm sure you feel nice and stretched. Those muscles feeling better already?

c-0: ^They're about to feel even better after this next stretch!
c-1: ^Well, they're about to feel even better after this next stretch!

StretchingSection2: ^I'm already feeling a lot better. My muscles are relaxed now. I hope yours are too!

c-0: ^I'm glad that my training programme is working for you!
c-1: ^Perhaps the next stretch will make them better for you.

StretchingSection3: ^That's good you can stop it there!

c-0: ^That's great to hear! I'm glad that stretch went well for you.
c-1: ^That's unfortunate. Feel free to try again in you own time. It gets easier with practice!

Closing: ^That's all for the Stretching exercises. How are you feeling?

c-0: ^I'm glad to hear that the stretches have worked well for you! With your muscles now rested you can freely move to the next exercise.
c-1: ^I'm sorry about that. You can try the exercises again if you couldn't get them right the first time. If you don't want to, you're free to move onto the next exercise.

NextClosing: ^Now for our final exercise we are going to <color=
^> write messages into a small diary </color>.
^> write a list of encouraging words to yourself, or you can write down your current thoughts and feelings onto the page</color>!
^Whether it's your anxieties or your current struggles, you're free to write down anything as you please, don't be afraid to write it all down!
^When you're finished writing in your journal, <color=
^> Press the Enter Key to submit your journal!</color>
